channel.title: Music in Russian on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Music in Russian on Rusland 1

item.title: The 25-Year Career of Zemfira
item.description: We start with music, for a change from old to new. 25 Years Zemfira Talgatovna Ramazanova (1976, in Tatar: Земфира Тәлгать кызы Рамазанова) made her debut in the last century (1999), under not overly creative creative but perhaps strategic title Zemfira.
